name: @klippa/nativescript-http
description: The best way to do HTTP requests in NativeScript, a drop-in replacement for the core HTTP with important improvements and additions like proper connection pooling, form data support and certificate pinning

scripts.build: npm i && ts-patch install && npm run ngcc && npm run ngc
scripts.build.old: npm i && ts-patch install && npm run ngcc && npm run ngc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && ts-patch install && cd ../demo && ns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && ts-patch install && cd ../demo && ns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm i && ts-patch install && cd ../demo-angular && ns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm i && ts-patch install && cd ../demo-angular && ns run android
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove @klippa/nativescript-http && ns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && ns plugin remove @klippa/nativescript-http && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
